lead_paragraph: The organization plan culminates years of difficulty for the airline, which has been battered by safety lapses, ballooning pension payments and the need to streamline.
snippet: The organization plan culminates years of difficulty for the airline, which has been battered by safety lapses, ballooning pension payments and the need to streamline.

headline.main: JAL to Sell Units and Cut Jobs as Part of Restructuring
headline.seo: JAL to Sell Units and Cut Jobs in Restructuring
headline.print_headline: JAL to Sell Units and Cut Jobs in Restructuring
